name: Protective Service Tactics
description: Strategies and techniques for VIP and dignitary protection in high-risk environments.

cards.title: Advance Security Planning
cards.description: Developing detailed security protocols and contingency plans before a protective mission.
bulletpoints: Conduct site assessments and vulnerability analyses
Plan primary and secondary evacuation routes
Coordinate security teams for seamless operations
cards.summaryText: Lock in advance security plans by vetting sites, plotting redundant escape routes, and synchronizing protection teams before the principal arrives.

cards.title: Protective Formation Drills
cards.description: Executing defensive formations and response tactics during a live security threat.
bulletpoints: Utilize diamond and wedge formations for optimal coverage
Manage crowd control and civilian safety under pressure
cards.summaryText: Shield principals in motion by refining diamond and wedge formations, reacting fluidly to threats, and steering crowds without breaking protective coverage.
